title: In Case And In Case Of

questions.question: I have bought some eggs .................................... the guests stay to lunch.
questions.description: In case is mainly used to talk about precautions.

questions.question: We will buy a chicken ........................................ the guests stay to lunch.
questions.description: We use if to express a condition - something which must happen first so that something else can happen. In case is mainly used to talk about precautions.

questions.question: Give me a call ...................................... you have doubts.
questions.description: In case is a conjunction. It is followed by a clause.

questions.question: The fire alarm will ring ..................................... fire erupts.
Call me .................................... there is a problem.
questions.description: We use in case before a clause.

questions.question: The exam will be postponed ......................................... there is a bus strike tomorrow.
The possession will be stopped ....................................... trouble.
questions.description: Use in case of before a noun.

questions.question: Show this to her ...................................... she asks for proof.
Call the fire brigade ........................................ a fire outbreak.
questions.description: We use in case of before a noun.
